title: Pizza with beer and tomato sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '225g pepperoni, diced', '450g bacon, diced', '1/3 (300g) tin chopped mushrooms, drained', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '800g passata', '250ml beer', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 unbaked pizza bases', '250g grated mozzarella cheese']
